text: Approval for distribution by viatron, inc. of the models capsure(r) z, 5033, 5034, 5534 and capsurefix(r) 4068 under a new trade name.  The devices will be marketed under the trade names vitatron(r) impulse(tm) img 49, impulse(tm) img 49b, impulse(tm) img 49jb, and pirouet(tm)+imu 49b. and are indicated for chronic pacing and sensing of the atrium and/or ventricle.
